movie.title: Nightbirds
movie.description_intro: While living rough on the streets of London's East End, a young man, Dink encounters the mysterious Dee and they begin a relationship. When tenderness gives way to cruelty they become consumed by darkness.
movie.description_full: While living rough on the streets of London's East End, a young man, Dink encounters the mysterious Dee and they begin a relationship. When tenderness gives way to cruelty they become consumed by darkness.

movies.title: Red Vacance Black Wedding
movies.summary: Segment 1- Red Vacance: Heerae, a young woman and a married middle-aged man, Taemook have been involved in an affair for 6 years. They plan to go on a vacation, but Boksoon, his wife finds out their affair and takes him to a remote place. There the she asks him about his affair. As he explains his affair, she becomes angrier. She is about to burn him. Meanwhile, Heerae receives a text message from him and she goes to meet him, but the text message was actually sent by his wife. All three persons then meet at a vacation home. *********Segment 2 -Black Wedding: As soon as a professor and his female student meet, they have an affair. Their relationship continues. One day, she asks him to officiate her wedding and he accepts. After the wedding the professor goes to the place where they had the affair, but the student, who should be leaving for her honeymoon, arrives at the place.

movies.title: Pawn Sacrifice
movies.summary: During the height of the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers when he challenges the Soviet Empire.
movies.description_full: During the height of the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers when he challenges the Soviet Empire.
movies.synopsis: During the height of the Cold War, American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer finds himself caught between two superpowers when he challenges the Soviet Empire.

movies.title: A Second Chance: Rivals!
movies.summary: It's city girls vs country girls in the most competitive gymnastics showdown ever. Get ready to tumble in A SECOND CHANCE: RIVALS!..
movies.description_full: It's city girls vs country girls in the most competitive gymnastics showdown ever. Get ready to tumble in A SECOND CHANCE: RIVALS!..
movies.synopsis: It's city girls vs country girls in the most competitive gymnastics showdown ever. Get ready to tumble in A SECOND CHANCE: RIVALS!..

movies.title: Believe in Me
movies.summary: Girls? The thought of coaching them seems preposterous to Clay Driscoll (earnest newcomer Jeffrey Donovan), who travels to Middleton, Okla., in the 1960s prepared to coach the varsity boys' team. But that position is filled, so he's forced to coach the girls' team -- the Lady Cyclones. Faced with an under-performing crew of untrained players, the coach begins to treat the girls like boys. They run laps in a closed gym and practice shots and plays they've never tried before -- and eventually their "old-fashioned grit" leads them to a Cinderella season culminating with the state championships. Along their way, Driscoll and the girls overcome several obstacles, most of all, gaining a fan base. Meanwhile, big man in town Ellis Brawley (Bruce Dern) can't stand Driscoll and his newfangled idea of empowering female athletes. Of course, the Lady Cyclones are up to the task of proving Brawley wrong. Driven by their caring young coach, the girls determine to play as hard as the boys, even ...
